Title: Silverlight Resource Extension
Description:
Silverlight Resource Extension.

Extension silverlight project for use ResX resources and localize satellite dll.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight Resource Extension improves:

- to help using localizable resource based on resx files;
- dynamic load resource from server;
- to provide extended mechanism load behavior and options;
- to have simple implementation of Ð¡ultureInfo resources provider.

Today library provides only string resources.

In Source Code there is an example how to use this library.
